name: ficus
content:

any tree or bush from many belonging to the Ficus genus (= group of related plants), including the fig and the banyan: One year we decorated a ficus instead of buying a Christmas tree. If you have small ficus in containers, inspect them once a week, turning over leaves.ficus tree He had a battle with his neighbours over his 12-foot-tall ficus trees. See also
fig
banyan
More examplesFewer examplesWe had an excellent meal in the quiet open-air restaurant, shaded by large ficus trees.Large leaves may need support from a cane or, in the case of ficus, can be gently rolled up with an elastic band.There are many members of the ficus family that make good houseplants.
